body: Ummm.... Berlinetta........ Berlin......... lady I'm about to serve you on a plate and nothing will stop me
She’s the girl that fucked the most men in the history of FGO
Not Fate related whatsoever but a cool take on the Tamamo no Mae legend. Character resembles Tamamo Cat (Berserker) a little too uncannily but even if this wasnt a Fate doujin its really good.
Oh before i forget, Iexpectedbetter should go eat shits and die.

I can't see why people could trigger over this? Her name is Berlinetta not Tamamo. While the design is similar, unless the author confirm it, i can't see her as Tamamo at all. Not to mention she said she been around for few hundred year while Tamamo is like few thousand year nine tails fox. Also Aids? Srl? You had won the Lamest guy in high school or something?
When did "disliking" equal "being triggered"? Also just pointing out stuff doesn't mean we're whining. She is for the dirt roads
imagine a fox spirit living in Japan from like the Heian period to the present calling herself berlinetta. Tamamo is truly wild

As a certified 1000% Tamamo simp who's been a fanboy SINCE before FGO ever happened, back when there were only like 2 good Tamamo doujins out there, i'd like to throw in my own two cents. While yes, it's been a LONG time since we got a genuinely new doujin from the new Tamamo god; Wisepeak, i wont lie when i say i was a little disappointed that it was of this nature and had "Tamamo" become a fully fledged prostitute who lives off cum. But here's the thing, i think there's a reason why this version of Tama is named Berlinetta. From the setting she's in to her backstory being different, it's clear that this Berlinetta as she's called here, is what would happen if Tamamo went full slut from the very beginning. So while this doujin basically has a one to one Tamamo look a like doing things we don't normally see from her from this artist, it's harmless. The countless amazing vanilla doujins of our favorite fox wife are still there. So if wisepeak wants to make Berlinetta slut it up, let him

Not everyone is "Triggered" by this, but the reason behind them being annoyed with this content I think anyone can accept as a fair point. Because with Tamamo doujins we often see the wholesome side of things and usually romantic vanilla style sex with the corresponding Tamamo's husband, whereas here she's reduced to a slut with no virtues. So obviously this doujin was made for a different type of reading audience. I'm also not saying the classic readers have to like this doujin style or genre, ( I certainly don't) but you can't deny this doujin is completely different from the usual dere Tamamo doujins.
10/10 people who get triggered by this shit shouldn't be on nhentai, even coming from a vanilla enjoyer like my self

I mean I doubt that'll change the opinion on how people feel about this doujin, lol. Just because she used to be a slut, doesn't mean people want to see it. Hell they probably don't like the doujin for different reasons as well.

Wow, people are triggered by Tamamo being a slut. No one bother to read the original lore anymore.... Tamamo is used to be like this. Some of her reputation were not false as being a seductive maiden and the likes.
I'm so used to Wisespeak's tamamo that I mistake the character as tamamo but still love it...
Immortal Used Goods. Also the streets is too young for her, she for the dirt roads

HUNDREDS of years having unprotected sex as a prostitute? The guys she gets with probably all die within 24 hours from Omega-ultra Aids, holy shit.
